name: coho
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small salmon (= a medium-sized, silver-coloured fish with pink flesh). Its flesh is eaten as a food: It really has a remarkable flavour, and I think it is as delicious as coho. When the coho were listed as threatened, only naturally spawning fish were protected The farmed cohos are harvested from January to March. Coho salmon spend a year or two years at sea and weigh in at between 2 and 7 kg.
More examplesFewer examplesI want to hike up to Elkhorn and catch a 10-pound coho salmon.A year after putting logs into the creek to create pools, tiny juvenile coho are swimming there.
